resources.string: Give a nickname for your repository

list one user account per line.
For example:
Alice
Bob

Thanks for download and install Commit Monitor. This application helps you to monitor subversion repositories for new commits. Currently, it supports the following svn protocols: svn, http, and https. New protocol support may be added in the future.

This is your first time to use Commit Monitor. In order to properly use Commit Monitor, you need to configure the repository settings first. Please press the \'next\' button to setup the repositories that you want to monitor. If you are not yet ready to monitor real world repository, you can add a dummy sample repository too.
Add sample repository: automatically add a repository as a sample, this can show you how does Commit Monitor work.
Add repository: setup your custom repository setting.
